DOC.brief_summary: To compare rate extent absorption doxycycline monohydrate capsule equivalent 100 mg doxycycline ( Par ) versus Monodox ( Oclassen Pharmaceuticals ) .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Doxycycline Monohydrate Capsules Monodox Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: To compare rate extent absorption doxycycline monohydrate capsule equivalent 100 mg doxycycline Par Pharmaceutical , Inc. , USA ( test ) versus Monodox Oclassen Pharmaceuticals , Inc. , USA reference administer 1 x 100 mg capsule fast condition .
